/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings painted in vibrant hues of red and green, their balconies and awnings adding character to the cityscape. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of daily life. Trees dot the sidewalk, providing a touch of nature amidst the urban setting. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, completing the picturesque view of this worldwide landmark.
